description:
As Wisteria and Marbas travel to the Lake District with Diana and Naberius, Snow has an encounter with some old friends that takes a dangerous turn.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Coups de feu du passé et du présent
Kaimaku wa Kako no Juusei to Tomo ni
The Echo of Gunfire and the Rise of the Curtain
開幕は過去の銃声と共に
